name: Trails Of Time Photo Game
description:
Trails of Time is chill photo game where you will be sent into different simulations on different planets.

The planets have a weather and some of them are even dangerous with enemies.

But the game is all about the photography and relax in enviroment set in future.

Please note that this game is ealry prototype and more locations, skins, and updates will come to life.
Make sure to visit the game Discord:
https://discord.gg/u9YAaXYym4
